asset.author: Camp Chef
asset.hookText:
http://www.campchef.com/outdoor-entertainment-gear-indoor-outdoor-super-screen-132.html

Curious to see how the Outdoor Entertainment Gear Indoor/Outdoor Super Screen 132 goes together? Check out this video and watch just how easy the Super Screen 132 goes together.

Here's some more info on the Outdoor Entertainment Gear Super Screen 132:

The Indoor/Outdoor Super Screen 132 is the ultimate in portable screens. It features a huge 132" screen made of durable Oxford nylon reflection material for high-resolution and enriched colors. A removable black backside blocks ambient light and detaches for rear projection. Sets up in just a few minutes, simply connect the durable 1" metal tubing frame, clip the screen into place, then tighten a few straps and you've got a firm, flat screen. Perfect for movies, business seminars, and sporting events. Includes stakes and tie-down guy lines for increased stability.

Screen:

    132" (11 ft) diagonal screen
    600D x 600D
    Wide screen 16:9 aspect ratio
    Screen carry bag included

Frame:

    1" diameter, 18 gauge powder coated, steel tubing
    4 frame stakes included
    4 guy lines and stakes included
    Frame carry bag included

Dimensions:

    105" H x 129" W
    Frame Bottom to Floor: 23"
    Weight: 34 lb.

For more information check out:
http://www.campchef.com/indoor-outdoor-super-screen-132.html
